quote: Fear exists before and after, but not while the shots are being fired, because, at that moment, you see men at their very limit, capable of the most heroic of actions and the most inhumane.
quote_letters: FEAR EXISTS BEFORE AND AFTER BUT NOT WHILE THE SHOTS ARE BEING FIRED BECAUSE AT THAT MOMENT YOU SEE MEN AT THEIR VERY LIMIT CAPABLE OF THE MOST HEROIC OF ACTIONS AND THE MOST INHUMANE
